name: Acid Trap
description:
In Acid Trap you control acid bubbles that leave acid puddles behind them. Whenever an area becomes enclosed by acid, it gets flooded. Your enemies can clean the ground around them, you must surround them to win.

My first entry on a game jam ! I couldn't find the time to make assets for this one but I'm pretty happy with the idea behind it.

The web build runs poorly, please download the game for a smoother experience.

External credits : 16x16 Dungeon Tileset by 0x72,  Marty Gots a Plan by Kevin MacLeod
